message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe is worth more than $1,000,000 to you. Given its unique value and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at a special price. My proposal is to sell the product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects my desire to make this valuable asset accessible to you while ensuring a fair return for its worth. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that you will find the product to be an excellent investment and a valuable addition to your collection or operations.
